system.description:
A fey is a creature with supernatural abilities and connections to nature or to some other force or place. Fey are usually human-shaped.

Features: 6-sided Hit Dice; base attack bonus equal to Â½ total Hit Dice (as wizard); good Reflex and Will saves; skill points (6 + Int modifier) per Hit Die.

Traits: Fey eat, sleep, and breathe; proficient with simple weapons and any weapons mentioned in entry; low-light vision.
